adminView: Admin view: All company meetings are visible.
processingPendingMessage:
This meeting has not been processed yet.
Record audio in a new meeting to generate minutes.
processingMessage: The AI is currently generating the minutes for this meeting. You can safely navigate away and come back later, the result will be here when it's ready.
refinementPlaceholder: e.g., 'Change the due date for Alice's task to 2024-08-10' or 'Add a decision that the marketing slogan will be...'
welcomeMessage: Your intelligent assistant for perfect meeting minutes. Select a meeting on the left or create a new one to begin.
errorAllFields: Please provide a title and add at least one participant.
errorNoAudio: Please record audio before generating minutes.
errorGeneratingMinutes: Failed to generate meeting minutes. Please check the console for details.
errorRefiningMinutes: Failed to refine meeting minutes. Please check the console for details.
loginToContinue: Log in to your account to continue
noMeetingsFound: No meetings found matching your criteria.
inPersonMeetingDescription: Records audio from your device's microphone. Ideal for meetings taking place in a physical room, where the microphone can capture all participants' voices.
recordFromBrowserTabDescription: Captures audio from an online meeting running in another browser tab (like Google Meet or Teams on the web). You must select 'Share tab' and enable 'Share tab audio'. Recording desktop apps is not supported due to browser security restrictions.
errorOnlineMeetingRecording: Recording failed. You must share a browser tab (not a window or screen) and ensure 'Share tab audio' is enabled. Recording desktop apps is not supported.
pressStartRecording: Press the button below to start recording.
forgotPasswordPrompt: This feature is not implemented in this demo. In a real application, this would send a password reset link to your email.
clickLogoToUpload: Click the logo to upload a new one
siteTitle: Transform your meetings into intelligent minutes.
siteSubtitle: AIScriba records, transcribes, and summarizes your conversations, creating structured, actionable documents automatically. Save time, improve clarity, and never miss a detail.
featuresTitle: Everything you need for productive meetings.
feature1Desc: Record directly from your microphone for in-person meetings or capture audio from any browser tab for online calls.
feature2Desc: Powered by Google's Gemini, get accurate transcriptions and concise summaries, identifying key points, decisions, and action items.
feature3Desc: Review structured minutes, make AI-assisted refinements, and export them as professional PDF documents.
feature4Desc: Company administrators can manage users, customize branding with their logo, and oversee all company meetings.
howItWorksTitle: From conversation to documentation in three simple steps.
step1Desc: Create a new meeting and record the audio using your preferred mode.
step2Desc: With a single click, our AI processes the audio and generates a complete, structured draft of the minutes.
step3Desc: Review the minutes, make any necessary refinements, and export them as a PDF.
recordingConsent: I have consent from all participants to proceed with the recording.
consentRequiredToRecord: Please confirm you have consent from all participants to start recording.
pricingTitle: Flexible pricing that scales with you.
pricingSubtitle: Choose the exact number of simultaneous recordings your team needs. All plans include the same great features.
limitExceededMessage: You have used all of your recording time for this month. Please wait for the next billing cycle or contact your administrator for an upgrade.
selectRecordings: Select the number of simultaneous recordings
securitySubtitle: Your conversations are confidential. We are committed to protecting your data.
securityGdprDesc: Our platform is built with privacy-by-design principles to help you meet your GDPR obligations.
securityConfidentialityDesc: No human ever listens to your recordings. The entire transcription and summarization process is fully automated.
securityEncryptionDesc: All your data, including audio files and minutes, will be encrypted at rest in our databases in the final version.
micInputDetected: Microphone input detected. You should see the line move when you speak.
micPermissionsError: Microphone access denied. Please grant permission to continue.
